actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Stafford without amendment. Without written report.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: An act to designate that hereafter the Federal building at 100 West Capital Street in Jackson, Mississippi, will be known as the Doctor A. H. McCoy Federal Building.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the Federal building in Jackson, Mississippi, as the Doctor A.H. McCoy Federal Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate that thereafter the Federal building at 100 West Capital Street in Jackson, Mississippi will be known as the Dr. A. H. McCoy Federal Building.
An act to designate that hereafter the Federal building at 100 West Capital Street in Jackson, Mississippi, will be known as the Doctor A. H. McCoy Federal Building.
